ExperimentTitle:
Experiment 

 To make T-joint on MS Sheet (Flat Position)
Steps:
Step 1

 Wear PPE Kit.

Step 2

 Clean the job surface with wire brush and remove burrs by filing.

Step 3

 Keep the job on welding table in “T” Position.

Step 4

 Cracking of both the cylinder

Step 5

 Fix regulators on both the cylinders.
Fits the regulators for the Right-handed threads run clockwise, and left-handed threads run counter clockwise.

Step 6.1

 Fix flashback arrestor and Fix hose connector on both the regulators.

Step 6.2

 Fix hose pipe on both the regulators

Step 6.3

 Fix hose clip to avoid leakage of the gas at regulators.

Step 6.4

 Fix hose connector and hose clip on welding torch

Step 7

 Set the gas pressure on the regulator as per nozzle size.(Set pressure on regulator as 0.15 kg/cm2)

Step 8.1

 Check leakage if any.

Step 8.2

 Fix nozzle on Welding Torch.

Step 9

 Open acetylene control valve about 1/4th and light the flame with spark lighter.

Step 10

 Do tack welding on both ends and centre of the job.
(Hold cutting torch)

Step 11

 With the help of tri square, check the alignment of the job and clean the tag weld.

Step 12

 Start Welding by Leftward Technique.

Step 13.1

 Turning off Flame

Step 13.2

 Now close both the gas cylinder valves.

Step 14

 Pick up C.S. brush and clean the surface.

Step 15

 Check the defects.
